title: 服务器附魔预览
author: w123456w30w
txt_content: 服务器里面附魔预览普通玩家无效，OP才能使用，请问这是怎么回事，谢谢

replies.author: 邱-XM8
replies.txt_content: 你有没有给他附魔权限[diamond_gem]

replies.author: w123456w30w
replies.txt_content:
邱-XM8 发表于 2015-2-27 21:35
你有没有给他附魔权限
请问是什么权限？谢谢了

replies.author: guizy
replies.txt_content:
帮你去官网上看了，好像服务端需要一个额外的文件：
“Note that EnchantView requires a server mod in order for it to work in multiplayer.”

http://www.minecraftforum.net/to ... s-mods/#EnchantView中有Requires CraftBukkit，你选一个对应你的用

replies.author: w123456w30w
replies.txt_content:
guizy 发表于 2015-3-5 13:26

“Note that EnchantView requires a server mod in or ...
